title: 新约 - 腓立比书(Philippians) - 第 2 章
subTitle: 新约 -- 腓立比书(Philippians) -- 第 2 章 ( 本篇共有 4 章 )

lineList.en: If there be therefore any consolation in Christ, if any comfort of love, if any fellowship of the Spirit, if any bowels and mercies,
lineList.cn: 所以在基督里若有什么劝勉，爱心有什么安慰，圣灵有什么交通，心中有什么慈悲怜悯，

lineList.en: Fulfil ye my joy, that ye be likeminded, having the same love, being of one accord, of one mind.
lineList.cn: 你们就要意念相同，爱心相同，有一样的心思，有一样的意念，使我们的喜乐可以满足。

lineList.en: Let nothing be done through strife or vainglory; but in lowliness of mind let each esteem other better than themselves.
lineList.cn: 凡事不可结党，不可贪图虚浮的荣耀。只要存心谦卑，各人看别人比自己强。

lineList.en: Look not every man on his own things, but every man also on the things of others.
lineList.cn: 各人不要单顾自己的事，也要顾别人的事。

lineList.en: Let this mind be in you, which was also in Christ Jesus:
lineList.cn: 你们当以基督耶稣的心为心。

lineList.en: Who, being in the form of God, thought it not robbery to be equal with God:
lineList.cn: 他本有神的行像，不以自己与神同等为强夺的。

lineList.en: But made himself of no reputation, and took upon him the form of a servant, and was made in the likeness of men:
lineList.cn: 凡倒虚己，取了奴仆的形像，成为人的样式。

lineList.en: And being found in fashion as a man, he humbled himself, and became obedient unto death, even the death of the cross.
lineList.cn: 既有人的样子，就自己卑微，存心顺服，以至于死，且死在十字架上。

lineList.en: Wherefore God also hath highly exalted him, and given him a name which is above every name:
lineList.cn: 所以神将他升为至高，又赐给他那超乎万名之上的名，

lineList.en: That at the name of Jesus every knee should bow, of things in heaven, and things in earth, and things under the earth;
lineList.cn: 叫一切在天上的，地上的，和地底下的，因耶稣的名，无不屈膝，

lineList.en: And that every tongue should confess that Jesus Christ is Lord, to the glory of God the Father.
lineList.cn: 无不口称耶稣基督为主，使荣耀归与父神。

lineList.en: Wherefore, my beloved, as ye have always obeyed, not as in my presence only, but now much more in my absence, work out your own salvation with fear and trembling.
lineList.cn: 这样看来，我亲爱的弟兄你们既是常顺服的，不但我在你们那里，就是我如今不在你们那里，更是顺服的，就当恐惧战兢，作成你们得救的工夫。

lineList.en: For it is God which worketh in you both to will and to do of his good pleasure.
lineList.cn: 因为你们立志行事，都是神在你们心里运行，为要成就他的美意。

lineList.en: Do all things without murmurings and disputings:
lineList.cn: 凡所行的，都不要发怨言，起争论，

lineList.en: That ye may be blameless and harmless, the sons of God, without rebuke, in the midst of a crooked and perverse nation, among whom ye shine as lights in the world;
lineList.cn: 使你们无可指摘，诚实无伪，在这弯曲悖谬的世代，作神无瑕无疵的儿女。你们显在这世代中，好像明光照耀，

lineList.en: Holding forth the word of life; that I may rejoice in the day of Christ, that I have not run in vain, neither laboured in vain.
lineList.cn: 将生命的道表明出来，叫我在基督的日子，好夸我没有空跑，也没有徒劳。

lineList.en: Yea, and if I be offered upon the sacrifice and service of your faith, I joy, and rejoice with you all.
lineList.cn: 我以你们的信心为供献的祭物。我若被浇奠在其上，也是喜乐，并且与你们众人一同喜乐。

lineList.en: For the same cause also do ye joy, and rejoice with me.
lineList.cn: 你们也要照样喜乐，并且与我一同喜乐。

lineList.en: But I trust in the Lord Jesus to send Timotheus shortly unto you, that I also may be of good comfort, when I know your state.
lineList.cn: 我靠主耶稣指望快打发提摩太去见你们，叫我知道你们的事，心里就得着安慰。

lineList.en: For I have no man likeminded, who will naturally care for your state.
lineList.cn: 因为我没有别人与我同心，实在挂念你们的事。

lineList.en: For all seek their own, not the things which are Jesus Christ's.
lineList.cn: 别人都求自己的事，并不求耶稣基督的事。

lineList.en: But ye know the proof of him, that, as a son with the father, he hath served with me in the gospel.
lineList.cn: 但你们知道提摩太的明证，他兴旺福音与我同劳，待我像儿子待父亲一样。

lineList.en: Him therefore I hope to send presently, so soon as I shall see how it will go with me.
lineList.cn: 所以我一看出我的事要怎样了结，就盼望立刻打发他去。

lineList.en: But I trust in the Lord that I also myself shall come shortly.
lineList.cn: 但我靠着主，自信我也必快去。

lineList.en: Yet I supposed it necessary to send to you Epaphroditus, my brother, and companion in labour, and fellowsoldier, but your messenger, and he that ministered to my wants.
lineList.cn: 然而我想必须打发以巴弗提到你们那里去。他是我的兄弟，与我一同作工，一同当兵，是你们所差遣的，也是供给我需用的。

lineList.en: For he longed after you all, and was full of heaviness, because that ye had heard that he had been sick.
lineList.cn: 他很想念你们众人，并且极其难过，因为你们听见他病了。

lineList.en: For indeed he was sick nigh unto death: but God had mercy on him; and not on him only, but on me also, lest I should have sorrow upon sorrow.
lineList.cn: 他实在是病了，几乎要死。然而神怜悯他，不但怜悯他，也怜悯我，免得我忧上加忧。

lineList.en: I sent him therefore the more carefully, that, when ye see him again, ye may rejoice, and that I may be the less sorrowful.
lineList.cn: 所以我越发急速打发他去，叫你们再见他，就可以喜乐，我也可以少些忧愁。

lineList.en: Receive him therefore in the Lord with all gladness; and hold such in reputation:
lineList.cn: 故此你们要在主里欢欢乐乐的接待他。而且要尊重这样的人。

lineList.en: Because for the work of Christ he was nigh unto death, not regarding his life, to supply your lack of service toward me.
lineList.cn: 因他为作基督的工夫，几乎至死，不顾性命，要补足你们供给我不及之处。
